discussion.p: A missing concept in [concept.construct]: Although (and rightly) declared in [utility.concepts], header <concepts&gt synopsis, the description and definition of TriviallyDefaultConstructible is missing.

li.ins: Note: describes types whose default constructor is trivial.

Requires: for every type T that is a trivial type ([basic.types]) or a class type with a trivial default constructor ([class.ctor]), a concept map TriviallyDefaultConstructible<T> shall be implicitly defined in namespace std.
